name: A Bird in Hand
effect:
Pay (2) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ally, put it into your hand.
"The Harpies communicate across the ridge using a series of signal fires. If we extinguish one, Marion is sure to come investigate." - Thisalee Crow

name: Angry Dread
effect: When this weapon enters play, you may draw a card.
"So I'll get to beat someone over the head with this? I'm in!" - Parvink
attributes: • Class: Death Knight Paladin Rogue Shaman Warrior

name: Black Blood
effect: Your hero deals 5 shadow damage to target ally. If you control a Disease, your hero also deals 5 shadow damage to target hero.

name: Blood Chill
effect:
Attach to target hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero.

If damage is dealt this way, exhaust each opposing hero or ally with Protector.

name: Bloodbane's Fall
effect: Your hero has Assault 1.
This cloak of Orbaz Bloodbane imbues the wearer with his latent aggression.
attributes: • Class: Death Knight Druid Hunter Mage Paladin Priest Rogue Shaman Warlock Warrior

name: Brothers in Death
effect:
On your turn: Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 / 3 Ghoul ally token into play.
"Tear that keep asunder, death knight. Find Koltira!" - Thassarian

name: Chains of Ice
effect:
Attach to target opposing ally. Search your deck for a Disease, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack.

name: Colossal Skull-Clad Cleaver
effect:
When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a skull counter to this weapon.

This weapon has Assault 1 for each skull counter on it.
"Its gruesome appearance is matched only by its insatiable hunger for victims." - Triton the Sacrilegous

name: Davron of Stormwind
effect: On your turn: (1), Flip Davron → Target hero or ally can't protect this turn.

name: Entrenched
effect:
If you control an ally: Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
"Diamant says you are to be trusted. Diamant is patient and wise, so I shall allow you to prove yourself." - Kor the Immovable

name: Frost Fever
effect:
Attach to target hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero.

Allies attached hero's controller controls lose and can't have Assault and Mend.
"Before you know it, your body will be entombed in frost, inside and out." - Krunkle Deadspark

name: Glacial Strike
effect: Your hero deals 5 frost damage to target ally.
"Your pain will be blissfully numbing." - Dragonslayer Drux

name: Horn of Winter
effect: Your hero and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.
"The last sound you'll hear before death grips your soul." - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: Hungering Cold
effect:
Frost Talent

Ongoing: When an opposing hero or ally exhausts, your hero deals 1 frost damage to it.

name: Jinie Swizzleshade
effect: Elusive
"Let's see how the raging elementals handle a heavy dose of the shadows."

name: Kelsa Wildfire
effect: Ferocity
"Beware the raging fury of flames!"

name: Knight Karia
effect: Protector

name: Koeus
effect: When this ally enters play, if you control an ability, you may destroy target ability.

name: Latro Abiectus
effect: Elusive
"I am morally certain you have made a critical error in judgement, orc."

name: Mystery Goo
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
The greenish substance inside the cauldron appears to be similar to what you found in the flask.

name: Olaf Steelbreaker
effect: Protector
"Without preparation and planning, there can be no victory!"

name: Outbreak
effect: Opposing allies have -X / -X this turn, where X is the cost of a Disease you control.
"The spread of flames may be quick and destructive, but the spread of disease is a sign of real power." - Aric Stonejack

name: Path of Frost
effect: Put target ally from your graveyard on top of your deck.
"For Magni's sake, how do you get away from these lads?" - Bragvi Stormstein

name: Patricia Potter
effect: "I shall embrace the fire and harness its power to do my bidding!"

name: Petreus Roffe
effect: Protector
"May the Light guide me, so that I may free Azeroth from the clutch of death!"

name: Scaramanga
effect: (2), Destroy this ally → Draw a card.
"Ours is the loneliest profession."

name: Stargazer Ronal
effect: When this ally is destroyed, you may shuffle target player's graveyard into his deck.
"We must follow the lead of Cenarius and Malfurion if we hope to stand against the Firelord."

name: Surge of Blood
effect: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally. Weapons you control have Assault 2 this turn.
"The essence of your soul is quite empowering." - Krog the Deathfist

name: Terina Calin
effect: When this ally enters play, if you control an equipment, you may destroy target equipment.

name: The Essence of Enmity
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"The creatures you seek swarm over the Den of Flame to the northwest and the Stonemaul Ruins to the north." - Brogg

name: The Grimtotem Weapon
effect:
Pay (3) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"I'll loan the totem to you if you agree to help me test it." - Apprentice Garion

name: The Key to Freedom
effect:
Pay (4) to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
The small brass key looks simple enough.
